text: I just want to share with you something that @Libbum made : <https://github.com/JuliaDynamics/Agents.jl/pull/372>  it is a GitHub action that automatically cleans up PR preview documentation branches. Because in Agents.jl we build a lot of plots, the Git repo was quickly getting out of hand. I can imagine something happening for Makie as well when you build doc preview PRs. Have a look!

elements.text: I just want to share with you something that @Libbum made :

it is a GitHub action that automatically cleans up PR preview documentation branches. Because in Agents.jl we build a lot of plots, the Git repo was quickly getting out of hand. I can imagine something happening for Makie as well when you build doc preview PRs. Have a look!

text: I stole it from CliMA! Its a great action regardless, though. Works very well.
